text: @SenSchumer The hypocrisy of Schumer is overwhelming. He and his partner in crime @SpeakerPelosi held up a previous COVID19 relief package for $100 million for the Kennedy Center, PBS & NPR while Americans died and lost their jobs & died. What did that have to do with COVID19? Shameless!
